original_text: And if you lend to those from whom you expect to receive, what credit is that to you? Even sinners lend to sinners, to get back the same amount.
korean_text: 너희가 받기를 바라고 사람들에게 꾸어 주면 칭찬 받을 것이 무엇이냐 죄인들도 그만큼 받고자 하여 죄인에게 꾸어 주느니라

sentences.original_text: And if you lend to those from whom you expect to receive,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 받을 것을 바라는 자들에게 빌려준다면,

sentences.original_text: what credit is that to you?
to get back the same amount.
